Peer-reviewed Journal Publications

  1. Zhang, F., & Zhou, Q. (2017). Application of Terrain Analysis in Watershed Hydrologic Modeling. Geography and Geo-Information Science, (CSCD, In Chinese)

  2. Zhang, F., Zhou, Q., Li, Q., Wu, G., & Liu, J. (2017). An enhanced approach for surface flow routing over drainage-constrained triangulated irregular networks. Transactions in GIS, http://doi.org/10.1111/tgis.12294 (Early View, SSCI)

  3. Du, S., Zhang, F., & Zhang, X. (2015). Semantic classification of urban buildings combining VHR image and GIS data: An improved random forest approach. ISPRS Journal of Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing, 105, 107–119. http://doi.org/10.1016/j.isprsjprs.2015.03.011

  4. Guo, Z., Du, S., & Zhang, F. (2013). Extracting Municipal Construction Zones from High-Resolution Remotely Sensed Image. Acta Scientiarum Naturalium Universitatis Pekinensis, 49(4), 635-642. (CSCD, In Chinese)

  5. Feng, X., Du, S., Zhang, F., & Wang, S. (2013). Urban Land Classification of High Resolution Images Based on Multi-scale Fusion. Geography and Geo-Information Science, 29(3), 43-47. (CSCD, In Chinese)

  6. Zhang, F., Du, S., & Guo, Z. (2013). Extracting municipal solid waste dumps based on high resolution images. Spectroscopy and Spectral Analysis, 33(8), 2024–2030. http://doi.org/10.3964/j.issn.1000-0593(2013)08-2024-07 (SCI, In Chinese)

Full-paper Conference Publications

  2. Zhang, F., Zhou, Q., Li, Q., Wu, G., & Liu, J. (2016). A High-performance method for simulating surface rainfall-runoff dynamics using particle system. ISPRS Annals of Photogrammetry, Remote Sensing and Spatial Information Sciences, III-2, 109–112. http://doi.org/10.5194/isprsannals-III-2-109-2016

  3. Zhang, F., & Zhou, Q. (2015). Low-altitude remote sensing platform for estimating suspended sediment concentration in tropical cloudy environment. IGARSS 2015 - 2015 IEEE International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium, 110–113. http://doi.org/10.1109/IGARSS.2015.7325710
